column5: Thought I'd share another quick video on how to catch spring dropbacks using lures. Enjoy and subscribe!

Excellent video. The single hook makes a big difference for snagging. That water looked ideal for using a Rebel Crick Hopper or Big Ant lure as well. Same technique but with a small wiggling lure. I use them always for Steelies but I replace the 2 tiny treble hooks with one (rear) treble hook and in deeper pools I put a bit of BB weight about 2 feet up the line¬† to get it down into the pool while not impeading the action. The steelies get pissed off and really nail it hard.
I noticed you have quite a few videos like this one, keep up good work!
Thanks, I try and keep them short and informative. Sub to the channel if you like it, I'll keep em coming.
That‚Äôs one of my fav ways of catching them üëç
